verses.roman:
lokera nistāra-hetu karena cintana
kemate e saba lokera ha-ibe tāraṇa

synonyms: lokera—of all people; nistāra-hetu—for the matter of deliverance; karena—does; cintana—contemplation; kemate—how; e—these; saba—all; lokera—of people in general; ha-ibe—will become; tāraṇa—liberation.
translation: Seeing the condition of the world, He began to think seriously of how all these people could be delivered from the clutches of māyā.
